comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: Middleweight Mike Gibbons (1887-1956), the "St. Paul Phantom" was older brother of boxer Tommy Gibbons. Mike's ring career lasted from 1907 to 1922, and he is credited with 111 wins, 38 by KO. He lost only nine bouts, and was never knocked out in the ring himself. Mike Gibbons' BoxRec bout list page.
